task.title: Transcribing a Slice
task.shortdesc: Use AI to automatically transcribe the audio in a slice.

step.cmd: Locate the slice you want to transcribe.

step.stepresult: The button shows a loading indicator while processing.

step.cmd: Wait for the transcription to complete.
step.stepresult: The transcribed text appears in the slice card.

step.cmd: Click the button to correct any transcription errors.

result.p:
The slice now contains the transcribed text, ready for highlighting and analysis.
